Clickable Prototype

DMV Appointment Booking Redesign

A redesign of the California DMV appointment booking tool that leverages a re-conceived mental model to provide an intuitive, unequivocal user experience.

The target user is a technology proficient baby boomer making a reservation from their desktop computer at home.

Client

Academic Project

Duration

3 weeks

Team

Conner Hunihan
UI/UX Designer

Personal Skills

Wireframing
Prototyping
Storyboarding
